description: Creole Carolina is Charleston and Mount Pleasant, SC areas' newest mobile food truck. We serve up all your southern favorites with authentic New Orleans flair!After a long love affair with and several trips to Louisiana, Carolina Creole owners and staff have brought to Charleston and Mount Pleasant a very unique and authentic taste of New Orleans and they made it mobile with a state of the art food truck, specifically designed for dishing out their favorite memories from the French Quarter to the bayous of the Mississippi delta.Add to that a 25 year history of professional southern cooking in Charleston, SC and Savannah GA, and it's a match made in culinary heaven."Wanting to be more approachable and affordable, we brought our food to the streets."The mobile food truck trend is something here to stay as it delivers a much higher quality finished product at a more reasonable price.
name: Carolina Creole
